  • Method Details

    • ReadFile

      public static List<String> ReadFile​(String file)
      This method creates a list of every word in the file. It takes in a string txt file. It has a try and catch statement to when add the file word by word to the string list.
      Parameters:
      file - Takes in a string txt file that the user wants to be read.
      Returns:
      Returns a string list with the imported words in the file.
      Throws:
      Catches - all exceptions in the file uploading process, mostly IO exceptions when inputing the document

    • CheckWord

      public static void CheckWord​(String word)
      This method checks the entire file and then checks to see if word is in unique word array and adds frequency if it is. If not it creates a new instantiated version of the Word
      Parameters:
      word - Takes in a string. The word that should be checked against the WordList

    • SortWord

      public static List<JunitTestingCh9.Word> SortWord​(List<JunitTestingCh9.Word> wordList)
      This method is used to sort the words by frequency
      Parameters:
      wordList - Takes a list of words(WordList) and sorts them by their frequency
      Returns:
      Returns the sorted WordList by highest frequency

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      This method is the main method for the program. It reads the file, checks the words, outprints, sorts the list and creates the GUI
      Parameters:
      args - Unused
